Questions.Question: Which animated series features a team of superhero teenagers?
Questions.Explanation: Teen Titans follows a group of young superheroes as they battle evil and face the trials of adolescence.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the superhero group in 'Big Hero 6'?
Questions.Explanation: Big Hero 6 is a team of six superheroes in the Marvel Comics and Disney animated film of the same name.

Questions.Question: In 'Avatar: The Last Airbender', who is the last surviving Airbender?
Questions.Explanation: Aang, the protagonist, is the last surviving Airbender and the Avatar who must bring balance to the world.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the superhero who leads the X-Men?
Questions.Explanation: Professor X, also known as Charles Xavier, is the founder and leader of the X-Men, advocating peaceful coexistence between mutants and humans.

Questions.Question: Which animated series follows a team of kids with superpowered martial arts skills?
Questions.Explanation: Xiaolin Showdown features a group of young heroes who use martial arts and mystical powers to protect the world from evil forces.

Questions.Question: Who is the primary antagonist in 'Voltron: Legendary Defender'?
Questions.Explanation: Zarkon is the ruthless leader of the Galra Empire and the main adversary of the Paladins in 'Voltron: Legendary Defender'.

Questions.Question: Which character is known for the catchphrase 'By the power of Grayskull'?
Questions.Explanation: He-Man, the alter ego of Prince Adam, transforms into the mighty warrior by proclaiming 'By the power of Grayskull' in the classic animated series.

Questions.Question: In 'ThunderCats', what planet do the ThunderCats come from?
Questions.Explanation: The ThunderCats hail from the now-destroyed planet Thundera, seeking refuge and battling evil on Third Earth.

Questions.Question: Which character wields a mystical artifact known as the Keyblade?
Questions.Explanation: Sora is the main protagonist in the 'Kingdom Hearts' series, wielding the Keyblade to combat darkness and protect worlds from malevolent forces.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the samurai who wields a magic sword in 'Samurai Jack'?
Questions.Explanation: Jack, also known as Samurai Jack, wields a mystical katana to battle the shape-shifting demon Aku and find a way back to his time.

Questions.Question: Which character is the leader of the Autobots in 'Transformers'?
Questions.Explanation: Optimus Prime is the noble leader of the Autobots, dedicated to protecting Earth and the universe from the tyranny of the Decepticons.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the team of ducks led by a superhero known as Darkwing Duck?
Questions.Explanation: The Quack Pack is a group of anthropomorphic ducks led by Darkwing Duck, known for their crime-fighting adventures in the city of St. Canard.

Questions.Question: In 'Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles', who is the eldest turtle?
Questions.Explanation: Leonardo is the disciplined leader and the eldest of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, known for his proficiency in ninjutsu and katana skills.

Questions.Question: Which animated series features a team of heroes called the Crystal Gems?
Questions.Explanation: Steven Universe follows the adventures of the Crystal Gems, alien heroes protecting Earth and nurturing Steven, a half-Gem boy.

Questions.Question: Who is the main protagonist in 'Ben 10'?
Questions.Explanation: Ben Tennyson, equipped with the Omnitrix, can transform into various alien forms to battle villains and protect the universe.

Questions.Question: In 'Young Justice', who is the protege of Batman and the team's leader?
Questions.Explanation: Nightwing, formerly known as Robin, matures into a capable leader, coordinating the covert operations of the young superhero team, Young Justice.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the characters' superhero group in 'Code Lyoko'?
Questions.Explanation: The Lyoko Warriors are a group of students who enter a virtual world to combat an artificial intelligence named XANA threatening the real world.

Questions.Question: Which character transforms into a powerful green monster in 'The Incredible Hulk'?
Questions.Explanation: Bruce Banner, when subjected to intense anger or stress, transforms into the Hulk, a giant, green-skinned, immensely strong creature.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the sorcerer who trains the title character in 'Young Justice'?
Questions.Explanation: Doctor Fate is a powerful sorcerer who mentors and guides the young heroes in learning the mystic arts and facing supernatural threats.

Questions.Question: In 'Spectacular Spider-Man', who is Peter Parker's love interest?
Questions.Explanation: Gwen Stacy is Peter Parker's first love interest, a classmate and aspiring young scientist who becomes entangled in his heroic endeavors.
